div.l: Made of a swerd ful trenchaunt was the blade
A Ioly popper · bare he in his powche
Ther was noman · for ꝑperil durst hym towche
A sheffield thwetil twetil thvetil bare he in his hose
Round was his fase · and Camuse his nose
And pilled as anape · was his sculle
He was a market beter at the fulle
Ther shuld no wight · hand vpon hym leye
That he ne swore · but that he shuld obeye
A thief he was forsoth · both of corn and mele
And that a sligh · and vsaund for to stele
His name was hoten · deynous Symkyn
A wif he hadde · com of noble kyn
The ꝑperson of the towne · hir fadir was
With hir he yaf ful many a panne of bras
For Symkyn shuld · in his bloode alye
She was I fostre · in a Nonnerie
For Symkyn wold no wif as he saide
But she were wele I noryed · and a maide
To saven his Estate · of yomanrie
And she was prowde · and pert as a pie
A ful faire sight · was vpon hem two
On halidayes beforn hir · wold he go
With a tipet wonde · about his hed
And she cam after · in a guyte of Red
And Symkyn had hosen of the same
Ther durst no wight · clepen hir but dame
Was non so hardy · that went bi the way
That with hir durst oones Rage or play
